HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.aboutus-top: We are the first Indonesian brand focused on reusable cloth products for healthier, smarter, and waste-less living.
HomePage.aboutus-mid: Our mission is to make sustainable living easier, shifting from toxic and disposable culture, by providing high quality yet affordable cloth alternatives to disposable products. Our locally manufactured products are the solution to fill the gap in zero-waste living necessities.
HomePage.aboutus-bottom:
Our best selling menstrual pads and menstrual cup products has helped
thousands of women shift to a healthier, more comfortable period.
HomePage.text-category: Not only feminine products, our product selection ranges across various categories, from home to travel.
HomePage.social-media:
Here our latest Instagram updates,
make sure you are stay informed and in the loop

PartnershipPage.q1: Interested to become our stockist / reseller?
PartnershipPage.a1: This option is suitable if you have your own online or offline store(s). Apply through the button below.
PartnershipPage.q2: Want to be KindKain affiliators on the marketplace?
PartnershipPage.a2:
This option is suitable for fellow creators who are active in social media and live streaming.

We have open affiliate programs in both Shopee and TikTok Shop, feel free to connect your account with our products.
PartnershipPage.q3: In need of our products for wedding or corporate souvenirs, hampers, or event merchandise?
PartnershipPage.a3: We have in house manufacturing for our products, bulk / custom order starting from 60pcs is available. Contact us with your requirements.
PartnershipPage.q4: Have any other inquiries on collaborating or doing partnership with KindKain?
PartnershipPage.a4: Don't be shy, say hello and chat with us!
